Objectifs du module: The Case Study consists in the realization end-to-end of a large project that runs in parallel with the academic courses, from November to the end of the program, end of March. It aims at placing the students in quasi real project management situation. It will allow them to put in practice what they have learnt but also develop their capacities to face unforeseen events, develop their creativty to find solutions and develop their soft skills and team work abilities The Case Study is is performed by small teams of students that are regularly reconfigured, allowing the students to interact with many new partners during the Case Study. A number of MS Management of energy projects professors will attend classes to coach the students on specific points. Invited experts will focus on theoritical or practical aspects of project management. Learning objectives Understand how large projects are managed Making the best use of the academic courses in a case that is very close to a real one Working in teams and improving intercultural management capabilities by roleplayingThe working groups composition will change at various occasions in order to avoid routine attitudes. Assessment : Team work evaluation and Individual evaluation
